importomics 0.99.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • importomics

Create design

create_design.Rd

Create design matrix for statistical analysis

create_design(
  object,
  formula = if (single_subgroup(object)) ~1 else ~0 + subgroup
)

create_design_matrix(...)

Arguments

object

SummarizedExperiment
formula

formula with svars
...

backward compatibility

Value

design matrix

Examples

file <- download_data('atkin18.somascan.adat')
object <- read_somascan(file, plot=FALSE)

#> 	Read: ~/importomicscache/datasets/atkin18/atkin18.somascan.adat
#> 		Guess replicate values from sampleids: D05.t0 => D05
#> 		========================================================
#> 		Sample types
#> 		Sample 
#> 		    67 
#> 		Retain 67/67 samples: ~SampleType %in% ~sample_type
#> 		========================================================
#> 		Sample qualities ("RowCheck")
#> 		PASS 
#> 		  67 
#> 		Retain 67/67 samples: ~RowCheck %in% ~sample_quality
#> 		========================================================
#> 		Feature qualities ("ColCheck")
#> 		FAIL PASS 
#> 		   4 1125 
#> 		Retain 1125/1129 features: ~ColCheck %in% ~feature_quality
#> 		========================================================
#> 		Log2 transform
create_design(object)

create_design(object, ~ 0 + subgroup + Sex + T2D + age + bmi)
